creator: marcel_kobain@hotmail.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Any chance you could turn this into a very small patch, then write a short junit unit test that verifies we can read / change / save / read this property? (It can probably re-use an existing test file for this)

creator: solid.danil@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 34025
patch and small test

Please apply this patch to 3.15 version.
It simply adds setter and getter for lastModifiedBy.
Test with core properties has been updated.

creator: solid.danil@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 34026
moved tests to separate method

creator: solid.danil@gmail.com
onealj@apache.org
text:
Applied in r1751948, r1751949, and r1751950. Will be included in POI 3.15 beta 3 release.

Updated changelog in r1751952.
I renamed these new methods to getLastModifiedByUser and setLastModifiedByUser for clarity.
creator: onealj@apache.org
